data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Bao-Shi, Liu, Long, Zhang, Feng (2011): The cobweb spiders of the genus Anelosimus Simon, 1891 (Araneae: Theridiidae) in Hainan Island, China. Zootaxa 2833: 49-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277326
